name: Xungible
description: Xungible is a decentralized social media platform with multi-chain NFT capability. Users can mint, buy, sell or auction NFT's on a selection of blockchains as well as post, like, share, comment and follow other users. Built on the XRPL for its speed, low cost and energy efficiency. Xungible is aiming to unite crypto communities and give social media users, content creators, artists and collectors a place to network.
